description:
Shuzo`s squad of manned torpedoes targets the Straw Hats and the giants! The crazed captain tests Luffy`s mettle in a showdown on land, but the wily pirate pulls off a supersized surprise in hopes to stomp out the madman for good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: - Saga dell`ambizione di Z - Rubber contro Shuzo
L’ambition du Z : Luffy contre Shuzo
Z no Yabou Hen: Luffy VS Shuzo!
Zの野望編 ルフィVSシューゾ!
